thread.title: Burke scores 17 to lead Jazz to 98-78 win over Nuggets
thread.title_full: Burke scores 17 to lead Jazz to 98-78 win over Nuggets - The Denver Post

author: The Associated Press
title: Burke scores 17 to lead Jazz to 98-78 win over Nuggets
text:
SALT LAKE CITY (AP) â€” Trey Burke scored 17 and Rudy Gobert had 14 points and 11 rebounds to lead the Utah Jazz to a 98-78 preseason win over the Denver Nuggets on Thursday night.
Danilo Gallinari had 19 points and Gary Harris added 13 for Denver, which finished 4-3 in the preseason.
Jazz: Brazilian rookie Raul Neto had 10 points, including two 3s, for his best scoring game of the preseason. . Gobert missed his first five free throws attempts. . Shot 54 percent and ended the preseason at 3-4.
Nuggets: Regular starters Emmanuel Mudiay (hamstring), Joffrey Lauvergne (back) and Wilson Chandler (hip) sat out the preseason finale.
Denver Nuggets forward Danilo Gallinari, left, goes to the basket as Utah Jazz guard Elijah Millsap, right, defends in the second quarter during NBA preseason basketball game Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015, in Salt Lake City. (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer) (Rick Bowmer/AP) Hot start: The Jazz started Neto at point guard and jumped out to a 14-0 lead. The Nuggets didn't score until Gallinari's layup with 6:36 left in the first quarter. Jazz led by as many as 27.
Up next: Nuggets open the regular season Wednesday at Houston. Utah starts at Detroit on Wednesday.
